Class QuizSetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuizSetManager

  • public class QuizSetManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages saving and loading of quiz sets using Java Serialization.

      • saveQuizSet

        public static void saveQuizSet(java.lang.String filename,
                               QuizSet quizSet)
        Saves the provided QuizSet to a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file path to save the quiz set.
        quizSet - The QuizSet object to save.

      • loadQuizSet

        public static QuizSet loadQuizSet(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads a QuizSet from a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file path from which to load the quiz set.
        Returns:
        The loaded QuizSet, or null if an error occurred.
